data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6HVz1XMEOwYQ7kNvgHYiTgi&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYBTF6fS-DoTsJ9PYzCVF4OfIiLHapPkKcFdxQCTubnIKA&oe=66E5741C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=f8KNQ89kBe4Q7kNvgHNZc95&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYCjj8c4rq0nMZ588eBKk4V8gOj0_gGA3FcRTn04cUtezg&oe=66E57DA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Fd2UCJdyyB0Q7kNvgGbS2DX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYDrxLZZuivc8ltwW6T0SCEp-j7XRyJdtYtQufy8eOUuTQ&oe=66E56507)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sYdAL8ozBtYQ7kNvgEn0GgH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYAV0pCO1nbBvuQLP07kKptvahYePW5SiXXD37wL6NBy2Q&oe=66E557E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DQr0Ji-563wQ7kNvgG9oodN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYCW2PQzPHfZZKEptzjOML5LLg63Y_Z4YlUpajRLrU9QVw&oe=66E58458)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=z-sR94r6mYoQ7kNvgG4Jg0m&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYAGpbB_7-z8oTBVpgkB4iUe_RVkKTBoBkqhK4pL6pelSQ&oe=66E580D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XBNq9NwXaMMQ7kNvgHBc2op&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYD5lMYTS50tdHp-egA_78rZfNEkCHG2Mm3WWnDEW2vfpg&oe=66E566F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=__IegPfgCNwQ7kNvgFUykxa&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYDh0SxM4zUaD20AykeYsY0piRI1Z9FwDI5KuMC1LaSSyg&oe=66E5516A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fOYo0iFoooYQ7kNvgF20V2l&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYD9Mvc_YhDU3qCyj8KuofXbpXid_5qYDsfG2pMlCoheAA&oe=66E56517)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ssE8iSy5m70Q7kNvgHgoqRC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ABEBKBl4s61dWUH4L4S4fQp&oh=00_AYDIKNfFOcewD5vroXvUxfvMnypTwVVk6MHqcRqeKXltgg&oe=66E5808C)
